actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit any act or threat of violence in a labor dispute and any conspiracy to accomplish such act or threat and to impose criminal and civil penalties therefor.
short_title: Crimes in Labor Disputes Act of 1981

summary.text: Crimes in Labor Disputes Act of 1981 - Establishes criminal penalties for any act of violence, threat of violence, or conspiracy to accomplish such act in a labor dispute by any person or organization.

titles.title: Crimes in Labor Disputes Act of 1981
A bill to prohibit any act or threat of violence in a labor dispute and any conspiracy to accomplish such act or threat and to impose criminal and civil penalties therefor.
